meanings.definition: Form a mental image of something
meanings.sent1: She visualized the story in her mind.
meanings.sent2: He visualized the map to plan his route.
meanings.sent3: The cat visualized catching the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The idea of success can be visualized as a mountain to climb.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing the sunset made it feel real.

meanings.definition: Represent or imagine something in a visual form
meanings.sent1: They visualized the data using graphs.
meanings.sent2: The artist visualized her emotions through her painting.
meanings.sent3: The robot visualized itself as a superhero.
meanings.sent4: His dream was visualized as a bright, shining star.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing the future helped them plan ahead.
